name: BLACK_MIRROR_INFLUENZA_01
description:
Accompanied with social media where half of my days are spent either in front of the phone or other electronic devices with screens. Social media are now a part of our reality. The social media critiques that we find were somewhat archaic.

What about social media's impacts on politics and business? Is information never too much? Are posting selfies outdoor are more important than the experience itself? Are most people feel incomplete when they are going on vacation but cannot take selfies? Are people prefer masturbating on the internet rather than seeking a sexual companion in real life? Do you prefer to read memes and newsfeeds rather than reading a whole book?

Loop Animation // GIF
3425 x 3425 px
